result.reason: The user requests the ability to detach panels (e.g., Connection, Config) into fully independent top-level windows that appear in the taskbar and Alt-Tab, improving multi-monitor workflow beyond the current owned floating window behavior.
result.approach: Extend WeifenLuo DockPanel logic (e.g., custom FloatWindowFactory) to create unowned top-level forms for floating panels, ensuring proper taskbar integration and independent window management.
